_sText:
=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-
Map Designed by  *M5 ABLES*
=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-

- This map is for spying 

* There are three types of play mode *


1 - [Easy] CT can only carry a knife and HP 100.

2 - [Normal] CT could carry a knife + be hidden from T but HP 60.

3 - [Hard] CT could carry a knife + be hidden from T + 
Pistol with 22 bullet but HP 50.


- As for T's DON'T WASTE TIME Because you only have 280 seconds to hide your Self.

- There is a Secret Room.

=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-
I Hope You enjoy the map *_^
=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-
